channel.title: Verizon 718 Server!
channel.description:
Verizon718/753
Welcome! Verizon718 is a fairly new server that is trying to bring you everything you need and want when looking for a RSPS, we are a Rune-Evo V3 based server (credits where applies). That is picking up where a already sucessfull server left off. we offer 24/7 uptime with 0 lag and dedicated staff that will help you with whatever you need!
Visit our website here to get started today!
http://www.verizon718.com
Visit our Chatbox for help or to chat !
http://verizon718.com/chat.html
Some features Verizon 718 has to offer! -Nex boss -Corporal boss -Flawless PVM -Hybrid Armours (Vanguard,Trickster,Battlemage) -100% working Nex armour -Virtus wand and book! -Drygore weapons -Fun minigames! -100% all working skills -Vbulletin Forums -Active Staff -Looking For Staff
Picture's coming soon ! ! Join Now !
